name: leoniogroup_hris
description: 1. Clone the repository either by downloading the contents of the repository [here](https://github.com/iliwysfyasbysuoi/LeonioGroup_HRIS), or using the command below (Note: git should be installed in your system for this to work). ``` git clone https://github.com/iliwysfyasbysuoi/LeonioGroup_HRIS.git ``` 2. Open Command Prompt 3. Navigate to the project folder - the folder containing the contents of the cloned or downloaded repository. 4. Run the command `npm install` to initialize and install all necessary modules used in the project. 6. Server runtime uses Nodemon. To run the server, we run the command `nodemon app`. Upon running the command, your Command Prompt should display the following statement: `Listening to port: 3000` 7. Go to http://localhost:3000/.
